timeline.content:
Hi Shivshankar,

We would love an update from you regarding the status of your accommodation. We currently have limited availability and want to help you find accommodation that is well within your 
requirements.

Just in case, if you have already found accommodation, you can help us with the details and we can try rolling out cashbacks for you, subject to availability in London.

Also, if you have friends looking for student accommodation, you can refer them at http://amberstudent.com/refer. If your referred friend books accommodation, you will get a 50 GBP Amazon gift card.
